channel.title: General Travel Work Yoyo on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Travel Work Yoyo on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: nyc. gay porn again.
item.description: I am in nyc. sitting at tommie’s apartment - listening to remixes and puffy electro. awesome. the yoyo contest was a lot of fun. i inadvertently may have starred in my first “porn” movie. As a joke on another yoyo player - me and some Duncan kids got naked and recorded over some of their “choice footage.” Oh yes. it ruled. however. may or will be quite scandalous. Another strike against my presidential campaign.
